title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.5 - Utilization of other resources
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.5 - Utilization of other resources

State Regulations
(a) Social services districts shall utilize
all existing congregate and home-delivered meals programs available without
cost, including title VII of the Older Americans Act. (b) Except for recipients of SSI, persons
aged 60 years or older and their spouses are eligible to purchase and use food
stamps for home-delivered meals under the conditions outlined in department
regulations. (See section
435.9
[b]
of this

Title.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
461.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
